channel.title: Moving lag, Please help its REALLY annoying
channel.description: ok, so when i walk or run in any direction it continuoisly stops for 1 second after i have taken 2 steps? so i will move 2 steps, my character stands still for a second then continues to move when i have clicked him to go. this might sound confusing, but Please try and help! :) x

item.title: Moving lag, Please help its REALLY annoying
item.dc:creator: @x_Reap3r x Reap3r
item.description:
@x_Reap3r wrote:

haha nah, its Great!
6gb ram
120gig solid state drive + 1Tb harddrive
nVidia GTX 480 Graphics Card
running brand new drivers all the time
the server isnt lagging at all, its just the walking, you can tell when going past npc’s or other players doing something, when the walking stops or jitters the other players on npcs dont lag or jitter?

edit: Works fine now, i had the consistences up to high.
&& my windows scores :
Processor - 7.7
memory ( Ram) - 6.9
graphics - 7.9
gaming graphics - 7.9
primary hard disk - 6.9

Read full topic
item.source: Moving lag, Please help its REALLY annoying

item.title: Moving lag, Please help its REALLY annoying
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“x Reap3r, post:4, topic:393861”]nuh the computer is awesome, like 1k gaming pc, but i must have changed something without noticing because it was fine before just randomly started as it seems?
thanks for the assistance so far btw :)[/quote]

It doesn’t how much the “Gaming PC” cost, it could still be a shitty Hard-drive, Ram, Graphics Driver OR anything else.
